analysis.description:
AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#327-339) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#333)
AbstractSale.toBytes20 (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#315-322) is declared view but contains assembly code

HcftSale (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#439-478) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol)

ERC20ReceiveAdapter.receive (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#218-230) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_value) (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#226-227)

AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#327-339) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(_token).transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#334-335)

MintingSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#360-367) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(buyer,sold.add(bonus)) (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#363-367)

AbstractSale.toBytes20 uses assembly (/unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#315-322)
	- /unique_chucks/20/0xd22693bf2a8be6cd1b44fcbc018a6e82db8ed874.sol#319-322
